casebody.data:
SANCHEZ, et al.
v.
COBBLESTONE HOA OF CLAYTON, INC. 374A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 21, 2016 J. Matthew Waters, Attorney at Law, Hope Derby Carmichael, Attorney at Law, for Cobblestone HOA Of Clayton, Inc. Tatita Sanchez, for Sanchez, Tatita M. Robert A. Spence, Jr., Attorney at Law, Smithfield, for Christopher, Frank. Dennis Draughon, for Draughon, Dennis, et al. Robert Sain, for Sain, Robert, et al. Vincent Franks, Jr., for Franks, Vincent (Jr.)

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 20th of October 2016 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 21st of October 2016."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 12th day of December 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
